```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
library(stringr)
library(readr)

# MARGAUX 
margaux <- readRDS("../data/processed/msg_df.rds")

margaux <- margaux %>%
  mutate(
    date = ymd_hms(date),
    year  = year(date),
    month = month(date),
    day   = day(date),
    time  = format(date, "%H:%M:%S")
  ) %>%
  mutate(sender = case_when(
    sender == "+19177941080" ~ "Margaux"
  ))
```

```{r}
library(shiny)
# install.packages("devtools")
# devtools::install_github("rasmusab/fullcalendar")
library(fullcalendar)
library(dplyr)

ui <- fluidPage(
  fullcalendarOutput("calendar"),
  textOutput("message")
)

server <- function(input, output, session) {
  
  df <- ethan %>%
    mutate(
      id = row_number(),
      start = date,
      title = substr(text, 1, 20)
    )
  
  output$calendar <- renderFullcalendar({
    fullcalendar(df)
  })

}

shinyApp(ui, server)
```
